data.title: Bonerama, Rebirth Brass Band and More To Play NOLA Summit at Jazz Fest
data.meta_description: The definitive resource for jambands (jam bands) and their fans, established in 1998. Daily news, features, set lists, reviews, charts, columns, audio, video, merchandise and more. Affiliated with the Relix Media Group LLC.
data.text:
Nolafunk has added a NOLA Summit to its Jazz Fest programming, featuring “Bonerama Gets The Led Out,” Rebirth Brass Band, Big Sam’s Funky Nation and several other local favorites.

The event is scheduled for the evening of Saturday, April 27 – the second official night of Jazz Fest – at the Howlin’ Wolf club.

The aforementioned “Bonerama Gets The Led Out” set will include a slection of Classic Bonerama as well as a Led Zeppelin set with special guest Elise Testone.

Additonal performers include Neville Was Brothers – featuring Tony Hall, John Gros, Brian Stolz, Mean Willie Green, Nick Daniels III and Eric Struthers – the Hot 8 Brass Band, and DJ Cochon de Lait, who will spin “Classic Rock Covered in Funk” between each set.

Check out the full listing of Nolafunk events (including ticket links) below:

THE NOLA SUMMIT

Bonerama Gets the Led Out: Classic Bonerama + Led Zeppelin, with special guest Elise Testone

Rebirth Brass Band

Big Sam’s Funky Nation

Neville Was Brothers with Tony Hall, John Gros, Brian Stoltz,

Mean Willie Green, Nick Daniels lll, Eric Struthers

Hot 8 Brass Band in the Wolf’s Den all night!

The Howlin’ Wolf

Saturday April 27, 2019

8:00pm Doors, 9:00pm Show

Ticket Link: http://bit.ly/2GPzVkk
